definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The crown is the source of oxygen, worker of the magic of photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 树冠是氧的来源，是神奇光合作用的制造者。

sentences.english: The aquatic-living colonies had a higher photosynthetic carbon fixation capacity than the natural colonies.
sentences.chinese: 水生原植体的光合固碳能力比天然原植体高。

sentences.english: The most common by far is photosynthetic plants that capture solar energy.
sentences.chinese: 最普遍的是一些吸收太阳能进行光合作用的植物。

sentences.english: The 14C-photosynthates would be transported to the bud during the entire growing season.
sentences.chinese: 在整个生长季节中，光合产物都向芽中输送。

sentences.english: With proper rate of sulphur fertilizer application, the photosynthetic rate of soybean was increased.
sentences.chinese: 适当的施用硫肥能提高大豆光合作用强度。

sentences.english: The combining ability is important parameter of breeding on high photosynthesis hybrid pepper varieties.
sentences.chinese: 配合力是选育强光合杂交辣椒品种的重要参数。

sentences.english: Photosynthetic pigment content was the highest in the middle leaf and lowest in the basic leaf.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜中部叶光合色素含量最高，基部叶最低。

sentences.english: This suggests that photosynthates from immature leaves are transported mainly to the top of the seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 这表明未成熟叶片的光合产物是向上运输到顶端的。

sentences.english: We now co-opt between one third and one half of all the photosynthesis on the planet.
sentences.chinese: 而地球上的光合作用仅仅为之前的三分之一到一半。

sentences.english: Cyanobacteria are autotrophic prokaryotes performing oxygenic photosynthesis similar to that of higher plants.
sentences.chinese: 蓝藻是一类能进行光合放氧作用的原核生物。

sentences.english: Some of our most important crop plants are ones that are not very efficient at photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 而我们一些重要农作物的光合作用效率不高。

sentences.english: The result showed that the rate of photosynthesis was increased and drought resistance was improved.
sentences.chinese: 试验结果表明，光合强度和抗旱性都有所增加。

sentences.english: The synthetic materials produced by photosynthesis to the flowering-beginning prior period of summer soybean is not significantly contributive to yield.
sentences.chinese: 夏大豆花芽分化前的光合产物对产量贡献很小。

sentences.english: Cross section of the cell show that the internal photo synthetic membrane are present as cycloid plica spiralis shape.
sentences.chinese: 细胞横切面显示内光合膜系统呈环形复瓦状结构。

sentences.english: Net photosynthesis rate responded most sensitively to soil water content relative to soil field capacity.
sentences.chinese: 净光合速率对接近土壤最大持水量的施水处理最敏感。

sentences.english: The grain-leaf ratio is a comprehensive trait estimating photosynthetic productivity of per unit leaf area.
sentences.chinese: 粒叶比是衡量单位叶面积光合生产力的综合性状。
